Trainers

Prebon laughed to himself. Medic? Yeah right. This bot was back-up to 
Ramulus, just a precaution. But now Prebon was in a jam. Slayer had 
no clear shot at Ramulus, and he needed to make up something about 
the where-abouts of Striker. But he still had an ace up his sleeve: 
Spears. Last time to get away from the Maximals he threatened to 
order Spears to terminate herself. He could always rely on the soft 
hearts of the Maximals to twirl around his finger. But that was last 
resort. He was hoping to get Ramulus' body intact so he could use it 
to host the spark of Lightrade, but that can't happen. Maybe he could 
piece something together from the remnants of both these bots. And 
perhaps any others that were waiting, cloaked, to attack. But he had 
a great plan ready.

"Striker is a fool. When we were getting ready to release him, he was 
irritable and attacked us. My men had to do extreme repair and are on 
their way, bringing him. Now, here's the deal. Spears walks over 
carefully to you. You hand her the map. She walks half of the way 
back. She throws the map to me. She does not go back to you! She 
stays right there, between us. If you try anything than to pull her 
closer or escape, I will send a signal to my men to end Striker's 
life before he arrives. I'll decide how to do the exchange when he 
gets here."

Prebon than sent a message directly into Spears's head, communication 
using the chip.

*Forget the map. When you get close enough to Ramulus, or the other 
it doesn't matter, pull a spear with your quickest speed and stab him 
repeadidly.*

"Go on! Get my map!"

Prebon walked away for a bit, making it look like he was frustrated 
that he wasn't getting a lot in the deal. But he was really sending a 
message. than he mumbled under his breath.

"Ignatius, take Savage with you into the air and circle around. As 
soon as Spears' stabs a bot with a Spear, open fire on the ground."

He than sent one to Slayer.

"As soon as Spears' stabs a bot with a Spear, you hit your jetpack 
and come down, dodging fire from above, and kill Ramulus."

Prebon returned to the exchange, thinking that all was in place.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream/Gotron

Starscream walked out of the caves to here The Lavacons transmission.

"Oh, I will give you a target. We will have a target very soon."

He walked over to teh body of Megatron, and began figuring out a way 
to remove the spark.

Meanwhile Gotron acknowledged KitKat.

"All right, I will wait for word."

He saw Bloodystriker, and instantly recognized him. He walked over.

"I remember you. You were the bot who opened the doors the first time 
to the Alliance base. Listen, I really hope you aren't doing what I'm 
thinking you're doing. We were just given an order not to tell Zardus 
anything. As long as we are with this group, we have to follow it's 
orders. We don't want to make this group an enemey, and acting like 
spies is going to make them one. We will tell Zardus whe it's all 
right."
